data.author: Asha
data.blogText: What if we can clean up the mess, and repurpose the waste? Phosporous, a key element for the growth of plants and animals, is a by-product of our soaps and detergents. The unchecked quantity that is fast flowing into our waters is causing the unchecked growth of algae which is killing our water ways.

data.blogTitle: Bats, soo important for the aquatic system
data.author: Asha
data.blogText: What if we can clean up the mess, and repurpose the waste? Phosporous, a key element for the growth of plants and animals, is a by-product of our soaps and detergents. The unchecked quantity that is fast flowing into our waters is causing the unchecked growth of algae which is killing our water ways.
